title: Server & Network - VPN Tunnel Down
description: An automated alert indicates that a site-to-site VPN tunnel between a client's office and their Azure environment is down.

tasks.description: Check the status of the VPN gateway in the Azure portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The Azure portal shows the gateway is active and connected.

tasks.description: Log in to the client's on-premise firewall and check the VPN logs.
tasks.expected_outcome: The firewall logs show a 'Phase 2 Mismatch' error, indicating a configuration problem.

tasks.description: Correct the misconfigured VPN policy on the on-premise firewall and restart the tunnel.
tasks.expected_outcome: The VPN tunnel successfully re-establishes its connection.
